perturbation.original_text: "Required Capital Contributions" means some combination of (a) one or      more unrestricted cash contributions to the capital of one or more of the      Borrowers made by the Investor, and/or (b) one or more Qualified      Subordinated Loans made by the Investor to one or more of the Borrowers, in      each case as required under Section 2 below, in any or all cases, in an      aggregate amount not to exceed $5,000,000 during the term of this      Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: "Financial Support" means some combination of (a) one or      more unrestricted cash infusions to the capital of one or more of the      Borrowers made by the Investor, and/or (b) one or more Qualified      Subordinated Loans made by the Investor to one or more of the Borrowers, in      each case as required under Section 2 below, in any or all cases, in an      aggregate amount not to exceed $2,500,000 during the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Replaces 'Required Capital Contributions' with 'Financial Support' which are used interchangeably. The amount has been reduced to create monetary discrepancy.

perturbation.original_text: The Investor agrees to make, and the applicable Borrower(s) agree(s) to accept, Required Capital Contributions in respect of the applicable 12 Month Period (or shorter period prior to July 3, 2006, as applicable) in an amount sufficient to cause (via an addition to Adjusted EBITDAR in the amount of such Required Capital Contributions) the Borrowers to comply with Section 2 of Schedule 10.28 to the Financing Agreement as of the last day of each Fiscal Quarter. Notwithstanding the foregoing or any other provision of this Agreement to the contrary, the Agent acknowledges and agrees that the Investor's obligation to make Required Capital Contributions hereunder shall be limited to an aggregate amount of $5,000,000 during the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Investor agrees to make, and the applicable Borrower(s) agree(s) to accept, Financial Assistance in respect of the applicable 12 Month Period (or shorter period prior to July 3, 2006, as applicable) in an amount sufficient to cause (via an addition to Adjusted EBITDAR in the amount of such Financial Assistance) the Borrowers to comply with Section 2 of Schedule 10.28 to the Financing Agreement as of the last day of each Fiscal Quarter. Notwithstanding the foregoing or any other provision of this Agreement to the contrary, the Agent acknowledges and agrees that the Investor's obligation to make Required Capital Contributions hereunder shall be limited to an aggregate amount of $5,000,000 during the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Replaces 'Required Capital Contributions' with 'Financial Assistance' which are used interchangeably. While the total amount of contribution is still at $5,000,000. Section 1 stated that the financial support cap is at $2,500,000. The amount has been reduced to create monetary discrepancy.

perturbation.original_text: The Investor acknowledges and agrees that if a Maintenance Event of Default (as defined in Section 10 below) has occurred and is continuing hereunder, the Agent, for itself and on behalf of the Lenders, shall have the non-exclusive right to obtain specific performance of the obligation of the Investor to make the Required Capital Contributions.
perturbation.changed_text: The Investor acknowledges and agrees that if a Maintenance Event of Default (as defined in Section 10 below) has occurred and is continuing hereunder, the Agent, for itself and on behalf of the Lenders, shall have the non-exclusive right to obtain specific performance of the obligation of the Investor to provide the Financial Support.
perturbation.explanation: Replaces 'Required Capital Contributions' with 'Financial Support' which are used interchangeably. This perpetuates the contradiction of having both contribution terms in one document which are not clearly defined. Section 1 stated that the financial support cap is at $2,500,000. The amount has been reduced to create monetary discrepancy.
